name: Parcel Propel
description:
Controls:

Use the mouse to aim and launch packages into the mailboxes to proceed to the next level, R to restart level, esc to open the pause menu

Also, the mailbox must be able to close to go to the next level. If it is unable, restart the level

(Game made for Trijam 132)

Versions:

v1.0 08/08/21 (Jam Version)

v2.0 coming soon hopefully
